price: Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa Allah Yã ji maganar waɗanda suka ce: "Lalle ne, Allah faƙĩri ne, mũ ne wadãtattu." za mu rubũta abin da suka faɗa, da kisan da suka yi wa Annabãwa bã da wani haƙƙi ba kuma Mu ce: "Ku ɗanɗani azãbar gõbara!
arabic: لَّقَدۡ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَقِيرٞ وَنَحۡنُ أَغۡنِيَآءُۘ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَالُواْ وَقَتۡلَهُمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيۡرِ حَقّٖ وَنَقُولُ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad samiʿa al-lahu qawla alladhīna qālū inna al-laha faqīrun wanaḥnu aghniyāu sanaktubu mā qālū waqatlahumu al-anbiyāa bighayri ḥaqqin wanaqūlu dhūqū ʿadhāba al-ḥarīqi
